channel.title: Countdown with Mins + Sec
channel.description:
how do i make it , at the CHATBOX, it comes like this
[Server] Restarting in 20 Mins.
etc etc.. because i gott my roflmao456's server restarter and have it to 150 mins. so it could be cool something like that..and i could choose etc.. like every 10 mins it comes like that..or something... battlescape isle, has something like that just on the RUN tab or something. so please, if just anybody could help me.

not ::update 60 omg not SYSTEM UPDATEEW!!! omfg,. a count down… just a count downer ,just saying it…

Lol its just a control panel for the server, you can put the next in and it will come up as the server saying it.
